mapper.select: SELECT movie_code, movie_title, movie_year, movie_origin, movie_sales, movie_rate, movie_genre, movie_age, movie_content, movie_poster FROM movie_mst
SELECT movie_code, movie_title, movie_year, movie_origin, movie_sales, movie_rate, movie_genre, movie_age, movie_content, movie_poster FROM movie_mst where movie_code = #{movieCode}

SELECT mm.movie_code, rp.person_code, rp.person_name, rp.person_img FROM movie_mst mm LEFT OUTER JOIN relate_person rp ON(rp.movie_code = mm.movie_code)
WHERE mm.movie_code = #{movieCode};
SELECT movie_code, movie_title, movie_year, movie_origin, movie_genre, movie_poster FROM movie_mst WHERE movie_genre = #{movieGenre}
